code: import{ActionTypes}from'../contants/action-type';export var setCategorys=function setCategorys(category){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECT_CATEGORY,payload:category};};export var selectedCategorys=function selectedCategorys(category){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECT_OF_CATEGORY,payload:category};};export var selectedRoomTypes=function selectedRoomTypes(roomsType){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECT_ROOM_TYPES,payload:roomsType};};export var selectedProductByMaterial=function selectedProductByMaterial(material){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECT_PRODUCT_BY_MATERIAL,payload:material};};export var selectedProductByThuongHieu=function selectedProductByThuongHieu(thuonghieu){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECT_PRODUCT_BY_THUONGHIEU,payload:thuonghieu};};
